Items.Title: Application no. 20065031 TCQ, pursuant to §20-226 of the Administrative Code of the City of New York, concerning the petition of Paleros, Inc, to establish, maintain and operate an unenclosed sidewalk café located at 37-01 30th Avenue, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 22.  This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if called-up by vote of the Council pursuant to Rule 11.20b of the Council and §20-226(g) of the New York City Administrative Code.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
